de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api

Interface AnnotationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationServiceImpl

    public interface AnnotationService
    This interface contains methods which are related to TagSet, Tag and Type for the annotation project .
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

    • Method Detail

      • createTag

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createTag(Tag tag,
                          User user)
               throws IOException
        creates a Tag for a given TagSet. Combination of tag name and tagset name should be unique
        Parameters:
        tag -
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTagSet

        user - The User who perform this operation

      • createLayer

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createLayer(AnnotationLayer type,
                            User user)
                 throws IOException
        creates a type which will be a span, chain, or arc(relation) type. Currently the annotation types are highly highly tied with the tagsets, one tagset per type. POS, Names Entity, and coreference links are span types while coreference chains and dependency parsings are arc(relation) types.
        Parameters:
        type -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • initializeTypesForProject

        void initializeTypesForProject(Project project,
                             User user,
                             String[] postags,
                             String[] posTagDescriptions,
                             String[] depTags,
                             String[] depTagDescriptions,
                             String[] neTags,
                             String[] neTagDescriptions,
                             String[] corefTypeTags,
                             String[] corefRelTags)
                               throws IOException
        Initialize the project with default AnnotationLayer, TagSets, and Tag s. This is done per Project. For older projects, this method is used to import old tagsets and convert to the new scheme.
        Parameters:
        aProject -
        Throws:
        IOException
